name: Thunder Discharge
text: If you control "Brave Token": Target 1 of your monsters equipped with an Equip Card that specifically lists "Brave Token" in its text; destroy as many monsters your opponent controls with an equal or lower ATK as possible, then you can equip 1 Equip Spell that specifically lists "Brave Token" in its text from your hand or GY to 1 appropriate monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Thunder Discharge" per turn.
